title: Welcome to react using react-i18next

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.

about-title: Hello, my name is Hamed Atayee!
about-description: I am an electronics enthusiast. Having 20 years of experience in the manufacture and installation of photovoltaic panels, I started repairing scooters and lithium batteries. I love innovation and technology. Rigorous and very meticulous, I will be delighted to be able to breathe new life into your device.
